name: in3-common
description: Common functions for in3 server and in3 client (ts versions )

scripts.docu:
typedoc  --exclude test --excludePrivate  --readme none --ignoreCompilerErrors --target ES6  --mode 'modules' --json doc.json src/index.ts ; cat  doc.json | slockit-docu index slockit/in3-common/blob/master/src "# Common Data Structures

This page contains a list of all Datastructures and Classes used within the IN3 Client and Server.
" >  src/README.md ; rm doc.json
scripts.updateTypes: npm install slockit-generator; slockit-types ; npm uninstall slockit-generator

author: Simon Jentzsch
